comments: Roger Hamrick is one of the least professional and generally unpleasant people I have ever come across. He obviously hates his job and is a misanthrope. He helps manage a distance learning and doesn\'t understand the concept of different time zones and the urgency of exams.

Roger is not a professor but I felt a need to rate him because he is one of the most mean spirited jerks I\'ve ever had the privilage of associating with. It is clear that he hates students and he treats them with thinly veiled contempt. He appears to also hate his job in general. Roger is an advisor, if you can get around him, do it.
